resource: 1002779.description=Hybrid-relabled components are covered for 8 years or 100,000 miles, whichever comes first, from original date of first use when sold as new. The HV battery may have longer coverage under emission warranty. See applicable Warranty & Maintenance Guide for details. 1002779.derived=false 1002779.vtc=true 1002779.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
